backend/main.mo: Actor implementing user profiles, financial entries, and savings goals with access control and CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence list mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of all major frontend files and components.
frontend/ANDROID_APK.md: Guide explaining prerequisites and steps to build the Android APK for the app.
frontend/android/.gitignore: Gitignore rules for Android build artifacts, IDE files, logs, and keystores.
frontend/android/app/build.gradle: Android app Gradle config defining SDK versions, dependencies, build types, and Capacitor integration.
frontend/android/app/capacitor.build.gra: Auto-generated Capacitor build file configuring Java compatibility and plugin variables.
frontend/android/app/proguard-rules.pro: ProGuard rules keeping Capacitor, WebView JS interfaces, and app classes.
frontend/android/app/src/main/AndroidMan: Android manifest defining app metadata, main activity, file provider, and Internet permission.
frontend/android/app/src/main/java/com/e: Main Capacitor activity initializing the WebView with custom configuration.
Configures WebView settings such as JS, storage, file access, mixed content, and caching.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/drawab: Splash screen drawable showing a white background and centered launcher icon.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/mipmap: Round adaptive launcher icon referencing the same themed layers.
Adaptive launcher icon definition specifying background and foreground layers.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/values: Defines primary, dark primary, and accent colors for the Android theme.
Defines background color used for the adaptive launcher icon.
Defines app strings like name, title, package name, and URL scheme.
Android theme definitions including action-bar variants and splash screen theme.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/xml/fi: File provider paths enabling cache and external file access.
frontend/android/build.gradle: Top-level Gradle config setting repositories, Android plugin versions, and clean task.
frontend/android/capacitor-cordova-andro: Gitignore for generated Cordova plugin build artifacts.
Gradle config for Capacitor's Cordova plugins library module.
Auto-generated version variables for Capacitor’s Cordova Android plugins.
frontend/android/capacitor.settings.grad: Auto-generated settings file linking the Capacitor Android project.
frontend/android/gradle.properties: Configures Gradle JVM args, AndroidX settings, Jetifier, Flipper version, CPU filter, and new architecture flag.
frontend/android/gradle/wrapper/gradle-w: Defines Gradle wrapper distribution settings, pointing to Gradle 8.0.
frontend/android/gradlew: UNIX shell script to bootstrap Gradle, resolve Java, and launch the wrapper.
frontend/android/gradlew.bat: Windows batch script to run the Gradle wrapper using Java.
frontend/android/settings.gradle: Includes app and Cordova plugin modules and applies Capacitor settings.
frontend/android/variables.gradle: Defines Android SDK versions and dependency version variables.
frontend/capacitor.config.ts: Capacitor app configuration including app ID, web directory, server settings, and Android options.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file loading the main React/TSX application.
frontend/scripts/android/build-debug-apk: Build script that compiles the web app, syncs Capacitor, and generates an Android debug APK.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, profile setup, layout, and page routing.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Analyt: Placeholder file with no implemented content.
Renders an interactive 3D pie chart based on entry data and category breakdown.
Analytics UI section enabling period selection and displaying pie chart breakdowns.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Shows a full‑screen login gate using Internet Identity and renders children only when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button tied to Internet Identity with error handling and React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Period: Lets users pick start and end dates or quickly select current month or all‑time ranges via popovers and calendars.
frontend/src/components/entries/DeleteEn: Confirmation dialog to delete an entry, showing entry details and calling the delete mutation with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/entries/EditEntr: Dialog for editing an entry's fields including date, type, amount, category, and note, then submitting an update mutation.
frontend/src/components/entries/EntriesE: Displays an empty‑state card encouraging users to add their first expense or saving entry.
frontend/src/components/entries/EntriesM: Responsive mobile list view of entries with badges, formatted amounts, notes, and edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/entries/EntriesT: Main entries table with filters, date range selection, mobile/desktop views, and edit/delete dialog management.
frontend/src/components/entries/EntryFor: Form component for creating expense or saving entries with validation and submission to backend.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Renders the app’s header with branding, user greeting, and navigation buttons.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper providing header, footer, styling layers, and main content container.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog prompting new users to enter and save their name via profile creation.
frontend/src/components/savings-goals/De: Confirmation dialog for deleting a savings goal using a backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/savings-goals/Sa: Dialog for creating or editing a savings goal with form fields and validation.
Displays a list of savings goals with progress, edit/delete actions, and dialogs.
frontend/src/components/statements/State: UI card for selecting a statement period, filtering entries, and exporting them as PDF or CSV.
frontend/src/constants/categories.ts: Defines fixed arrays of expense and saving categories and exports related TypeScript types.
React Query hook that fetches dashboard data from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useEntries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching, adding/updating, and deleting financial entries with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useSavingsGoa: React Query hooks for retrieving, creating/updating, and deleting savings goals.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useUserProfil: Hooks for fetching and updating the caller's user profile, role, and admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and auto‑invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, storing identity and exposing login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles and theme variables for light/dark modes with custom animated background effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard page that fetches entries and summary data, applies date filtering, and displays financial overview components.
frontend/src/pages/DownloadApkPage.tsx: Provides APK download functionality with instructions and system requirements for installing the Android app.
frontend/src/pages/EntriesPage.tsx: Displays and manages financial entries with a toggleable form, entries table, and statement export.
frontend/src/pages/SavingsGoalsPage.tsx: Shows savings goals list and a dialog to create new goals, loading data from the backend.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Utilities for computing chart data by period, including bar and pie chart aggregation from entries.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Formats amounts as INR currency using locale settings.
frontend/src/utils/icErrors.ts: Normalizes Internet Computer backend errors into readable user-facing messages.
frontend/src/utils/simplePdf.ts: Lightweight PDF generator that constructs pages with text and lines without external dependencies.
frontend/src/utils/statementPdf.ts: Builds a financial statement PDF with entries and summary using the SimplePDF utility.
frontend/src/utils/statementPeriod.ts: Computes date ranges for monthly or yearly statement periods, filters entries within those ranges, and generates human-readable period labels.
frontend/src/utils/statementXls.ts: Generates a CSV-based XLS blob for statement data, including header info, sorted entries, and a summary section.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and manage hash-based routing values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and container settings for the app’s design system.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, planned features, design requirements, issues, and configuration metadata.
